[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: enc()] [Encryption cost asymmetry] Is encryption significantly cheaper than decryption, enabling asymmetric DoS where attackers cheaply generate expensive-to-verify ciphertexts? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: enc()] [Context separation] Can the same public key be used for both encryption and Ed25519 signatures, enabling cross-protocol attacks that break security? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: hash_group_element_to_aes_key()] [Domain tag reuse] Can the domain separation tag collide with tags used in other parts of Aptos, enabling cross-context key confusion attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/mod.rs] [Trait: AsymmetricEncryption] [Algorithm substitution] Can attackers trick the system into using a different AsymmetricEncryption implementation with weaker security properties? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/mod.rs] [Trait: AsymmetricEncryption] [Confidential transaction leakage] If used for confidential transactions, can encryption weaknesses enable attackers to decrypt transaction amounts and drain funds? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: dec()] [Governance vote privacy] If used for encrypted governance votes, can decryption vulnerabilities reveal vote contents before voting period ends, enabling vote manipulation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/mod.rs] [Trait: AsymmetricEncryption] [Stake delegation privacy] If used for private stake delegation, can encryption breaks expose delegation relationships enabling targeted attacks on validators? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Struct: ElGamalCurve25519Aes256Gcm] [Zero-knowledge proof integration] If this encryption is used with ZK proofs, can the hybrid scheme's properties break soundness or zero-knowledge properties? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: dec()] [Decryption oracle] Can attackers use validators as decryption oracles by submitting specially crafted ciphertexts and observing success/failure responses? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Function: key_gen()] [Key derivation] Can the same master secret be used to deterministically derive multiple keypairs, and does this weaken security if the master secret leaks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/mod.rs] [Trait: AsymmetricEncryption] [Versioning] Does the trait support versioning to enable cryptographic agility, and can version confusion enable downgrade attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/asymmetric_encryption/elgamal_curve25519_aes256_gcm.rs] [Test: gen_enc_dec()] [Test coverage] Does the test suite cover all edge cases including empty messages, maximum size messages, invalid keys, and malformed ciphertexts? (Low)
